jchess.ruleengine

Class PawnRulesProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchess.ruleengine.PawnRulesProcessor

  • public final class PawnRulesProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a custom class specific to process the custom rules that are peculiar to Pawn piece only. This class defines all the custom rules that at the moments are not supportable in XML.
    Since:
    7 Dec 2019
    Author:
    Sajad Karim
